This website is AudioEye enabled and is being optimized for accessibility. To open the AudioEye Toolbar, press "shift + =". Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled “Explore your accessibility options”.

# Mayor Mike Millman

![Mike Millman](https://www.ci.woodinville.wa.us/ImageRepository/Document?documentID=1067)

## Mike Millman, City Councilmember

**Phone:** 425-489-2700  
[Email Mike Millman](mailto:MMillman@ci.woodinville.wa.us)

**Position:** Number 4  
**Term Expires:** December 31, 2027

## About the Mayor

- Mayor since January 2022
- Councilmember since February 2021
- Woodinville resident 1992-present
- City Planning Commissioner 2019-2021
- Woodinville Fire District Commissioner Vice Chair 2018-2021
- Station Captain Everett Fire Dept. 1990-2018
- Small Business Owner 1994-2001
